Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2018 08:42PM Deb6700 wrote: I am new to this site. I get mammos every year. This week I had a mammo and the result was "Birads4 - Greater than10 pleomorphic clustered calcifications in the subareolar right breast." Having stereotactic needle biopsy on Jan 30, 2018. I am really scared. Really scared.
Posts.Title: Pleomorphic Calcifications - Biopsy Monday Butterflylady2012 Moderators
